page.title: 11Population - By Mrs Jeffery
page.content: There are 286 adults and 92 children living within the area of the map, mostly in the village of Cheriton Bishop. This only represents part of the Parish of Cheriton Bishop; the draft electoral roll for the whole parish lists 510 adults. The population is increasing as new housing is erected. The local GP, whose practise covers Dunsford and Christow, has increased his list by 600 patients in the last 3 years. About 23% of his patients are retired (national average 18%). The midwife deals with 4-5 births per annum within the area of the map. The newcomers are from all parts of Britain, especially from the Midlands and the South-East. They come to find work a better quality of life. The native Devonians are more involved in agriculture than the former.
